SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Tb.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM product
AND state IS NOT NULL
AND STATE = 'value'
AND STATE = 'exclusive'
AND wine = '레드'

AND wine = '로제'

ORDER BY discountrate DESC
